text: Young Winston is a 1972 British biographical drama movie about the early years of Winston Churchill. It was directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Simon Ward, Robert Shaw, Anne Bancroft, Jack Hawkins, Ian Holm, Anthony Hopkins, Patrick Magee, Edward Woodward and John Mills. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for three Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1973. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s war movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1972 drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British war movies Category:1970s British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Attenborough Category:Movies set in the 1870s Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies set in the 1890s Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies set in Sudan Category:1970s epic movies Category:Movies about politicians
title: Young Winston
